attributes.action: fully & deeply investigate the ultilities {gas electric & water Companies } price increases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By forming a Sub Committee to expediate an enquiry as to the extortionate Price 'Ikes'that the Energy Firms are forcing on to the Public especially after the recent comment by one particular 'Director' saying " ---more for us" or words to that effect.Apologies are not acceptable with a serious matter such as this.the likes of these rising prices has never been known before in Peacetime and yet the Government do nothing!
